needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text: This essay begins with a reflective tone, exploring the theme of what makes people successful in their work. The author describes how, historically, individuals were driven by their passion and not just by prestige, and how the mindset of the time shaped the industry.
